title: Ep. 71 - Maternity Leave Roundup
itunes:title: Ep. 71 - Maternity Leave Roundup
description:
We're BAAAAAAAAACK! It's Erin. It's Melody. TOGETHER AGAIN! In this episode we chat a bit about what we did over maternity leave, but mostly we talk about all about the books we read (listed below) and the 2019 HB Reading Embrace! 
 - Merry Inkmas by Talia Hibbert
 - A Girl Like Her by Talia Hibbert
 - Untouchable: A Small Town Romance by Talia Hibbert
 - Just For Him Complete Series by Talia Hibbert
 - Dare to Love a Duke by Eva Leigh
 - Fair, Bright, and Terrible by Elizabeth Kingston
 - A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas
 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas
 - Once Ghosted, Twice Shy by Alyssa Cole
 - The Scarlett Letters: My Secret Year of Men in an LA Dungeon by Jenny Nordbak
 - Heart and Hand by Rebel Carter
 Bonus Content: 
 Breastfeeding friendship mishaps because Valor is a special guest!
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Kathy, you are descended from the Hippocampus; the half horse, half sea creature who was often depicted pulling Poseidon's chariot. Like the Hippocampus, you're graceful and agile, if not always physically, definitely mentally. Your conversation flows due to your creativity, imagination, and easy empathy. Your pack animal ancestor was known to live deep in the ocean, away from the tumult of the surface and, likewise, you crave time in your refuge to recharge, soaking up the tranquility and loyalty of your inner circle. Sailors considered the Hippocampus a good omen because they were a gentle, care-taking creature. Those qualities are reflected in your deep, soulful eyes, while the sparkle and fine laugh lines are a reflection of the joy you take in the choices you've made.
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
